title: Mimir.Puzzles.god
body:
I am a God of Wisdom. 
It would be unseemly for me to favor a single human from Midgard.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.asgard]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.asgard
body:
I have matters to attend to with Odin and the rest of the Gods. 
My ultimate goal would take me into Asgard itself.

[[Mimir.Puzzles.convenient]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.convenient
body:
That WOULD seem convenient for my current predicament. 
Still, I should not take part in human affairs without Odin’s consent… 
Unless...

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.unless]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.unless
body:
Unless what?

[[Mimir.Puzzles.worthy]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.worthy
body:
Unless said human was worthy of my wisdom... 
Excelling in knowledge, logic thinking and observation skills.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.five]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.five
body:
HA! Five of my finest attributes!

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials
body:
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager startMimirPuzzles>>
<<if not visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial1")>>
[[How can I prove my knowledge wothy...er...est..ness? |Mimir.Puzzles.trial1]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial1") and $HoenirKnown is false>>
[[Can you repeat the knowledge question? |Mimir.Puzzles.trial1repeat]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial1") and $HoenirKnown is true and not visited ("Mimir.trial1complete")>>
[[Hello, Mimir… or should I say HOENIR! |Mimir.Puzzles.trial1complete]]
<<endif>>

<<if not visited ("Mimir.Logic.trial2")>>
[[How can I prove my logic thinking? |Mimir.Logic.trial2]]
<<endif>>

<<if not visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial3")>>
[[My sight is impeccable, what is it you want me to observe? |Mimir.Puzzles.trial3]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial3") and $sawItem is false>>
[[What is it I’m looking for? |Mimir.Puzzles.trial3repeat]]
<<elseif visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial3") and $sawItem is true and not visited ("Mimir.trial3complete")>>
[[Did you see that [ITEM]? That’s not something you see everyday on a battlefield, is it? |Mimir.Puzzles.trial3complete]]
<<endif>>

<<if visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial3") and visited ("Mimir.Logic.trial2") and visited ("Mimir.Puzzles.trial1") and $allPzComplete is false>>
[[I'll be right back|Mimir.Puzzles.Exit]]
<<endif>>

<<if $allPzComplete is true>>
[[Mimir.Ending.potential]]
<<endif>>

title: Mimir.Puzzles.trial1
body:
Off to a great start there, my friend. 
Anyway, any scholar worth his salt should have the basic lore regarding his Gods history. 
Before I was killed, I lived for a while with the Vanir Gods, along with another Aesir God such as myself. 
You have to name that God to prove your knowledge.
[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.silence]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.trial3
body:
Something in this field clearly doesn’t belong... 
and was probably introduced by Odin, they same way I arrived.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.finger]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.trial1repeat
body:
Who was with me as a guest to the Vanir Gods?

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.RightEasy]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.trial1complete
body:
No, you should not, but that IS the right answer. 
Hoenir was the other God the Vanir hosted along with me. 
Good job!

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.OtherGod]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.silence
body:
....

[[Mimir.Puzzles.Monrjiall?]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.Monrjiall?
body:
Monrjiall?

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.DoneTalking]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.DoneTalking
body:
Oh, yes, you are done talking.

[[Mimir.Puzzles.answer?]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.answer?
body:
Yes, do you know the answer?

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.AnswerGoThere]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.AnswerGoThere
body:
Of course, everybody knows that… I just need to… um… check something first.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.RightEasy
body:
Right, easy. I’ll be right back.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.OtherGod
body:
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager pz2complete>>

What other God?

<<set $pz2complete to true>>

<<if $pz2complete is true and $pz3complete is true and $pz4complete is true>>
<<set $allPzComplete to true>>
<<endif>>

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.Exit
body: Of course, I'm not going anywhere anytime soon.

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.finger
body:
That’s easy. 
The giant finger that keeps appearing near me every few seconds.

[[Mimir.Puzzles.What?]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.What?
body:
What?

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.What?]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.What?
body:
What?

[[Mimir.Puzzles.WhatFinger]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.WhatFinger
body:
What giant finger?

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.Where?]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.Where?
body:
A giant finger? Where?

[[Mimir.Puzzles.YouGiantFinger]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.YouGiantFinger
body:
You just said there was a giant finger!

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.Nonsense]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.Nonsense
body:
I said no such thing! That’s nonsense!

[[Mimir.Puzzles.Nevermind]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.Nevermind
body:
But… nevermind, search for something that does not belong and tell me what it is.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.OtherFinger]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.OtherFinger
body:
Other than the giant finger then, got it!

[[Mimir.Puzzles.sigh]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.sigh
body:
*sigh*

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.trial3repeat
body:
Something that clearly does not belong in this world, the same as me.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.SawSomething]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.SawSomething
body:
Yes, I think I saw something.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Puzzles.trial3complete
body:
That is it! Very observant of you. Well done!

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.thanks]]

title: Monrjiall.Puzzles.thanks
body:
<<DialogueAction PuzzleManager pz4complete>>

Thank you! 
That is what?

<<set $pz4complete to true>>

<<if $pz2complete is true and $pz3complete is true and $pz4complete is true>>
<<set $allPzComplete to true>>
<<endif>>

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]
